ğŸ‘‹ Letâ€˜s introduce Florian Schnitzler and NRW.Global Business The partnership between NRW.Global Business and xdeck is shaped by the shared commitment to supporting startups ğŸ¤ We have been working together as partners for several years now. NRW.Global Business is not only reaching out to a wide audience of innovators but is also offering unique opportunities for our founders. â˜ To Florian, innovation means the journey of transforming a simple idea, born out of necessity or curiosity, into solutions that redefine our lives and add value to humanity. At his core, there are three things Florian cannot work without: his unwavering motivation, his deep-seated passion for the tech industry, and his insatiable curiosity. We are looking forward to continue the promising partnership and create lasting impacts together ğŸš€ #xdeckpartner #startups #innovation

Wow! Yesterday I got the email and saw this news :)) Super happy that Starnus has been nominated for the Brabant40 awards and is recognized as one of the top 40 startups of the region. This is a great recognition for us, and our next steps is to become one of the top and fastets growing startups in Europe and then in the world ;) Our ambition is what will put us on the top 10 lists everywhere! Our ambition is beyond what has been seen and built until now, Starnus is not just another robotics company you may recognize (or not) and may operate on some corners of the world; our ambition is to become the world's FIRST automated work-force provider and dominate at global scale. We take small steps, but consistent, and aim super high! #startup #awards #recognition #media #fame #brabant #holland #world #robotics #automation #workforce #development

Exciting news awaits you at this year's Hinterland of Things Conference! As you know, the #Hinterland24 is all about bringing together startups, technology, and business decision-makers. Thatâ€™s why weâ€™re excited to announce our new final pitch event thatâ€™s coming to our stage: the OOTB.NRW startup competition! OUT OF THE BOX.NRW (OOTB.NRW) is a startup competition initiated by Ministerium fÃ¼r Wirtschaft, Industrie, Klimaschutz und Energie des Landes NRW(MWIKE) of North Rhine-Westphalia (NRW). ğ— ğ—”ğ—ğ—˜ ğ—œğ—§ ğ—¢ğ—¡ğ—§ğ—¢ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—˜ "ğ—§ğ—¢ğ—£ ğŸ®ğŸ° ğ—œğ—¡ ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ°" ğ—Ÿğ—œğ—¦ğ—§ Out of all the applications, a committee of NRWâ€™s top VCs will hand-select the â€œTop 24 in 2024â€ List of NRWâ€™s startups and put them on the radar! To do so, weâ€™re teaming up with VCs such as Simon Capital, coparion, Cusp Capital, neoteq ventures and more! ğ—–ğ—”ğ—¦ğ—§ ğ—¬ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—¥ ğ—©ğ—¢ğ—§ğ—˜ ğ—™ğ—¢ğ—¥ ğ—§ğ—›ğ—˜ ğ—§ğ—¢ğ—£ ğŸ­ğŸ¬ Weâ€™ll need ALL OF YOU to vote for the Top 10 and give them the chance to not only win 50k â€“ thanks to the NRW.BANK â€“ but also to pitch in front of the Hinterland of Things audience of 2,500 attendees, among them Top Voices from the startup scene, including Verena Pausder, Dr. Gesa Miczaika, Valerie B., Frank Thelen, Magdalena Oehl, and many other prominent figures from the German tech scene! ğ—¡ğ—¢ğ—ª: ğ—œğ—¦ ğ—¬ğ—¢ğ—¨ğ—¥ ğ—¦ğ—§ğ—”ğ—¥ğ—§ğ—¨ğ—£ ğ—¥ğ—˜ğ—”ğ——ğ—¬ ğ—§ğ—¢ ğ—ªğ—œğ—¡? The call for applications starts TODAY! The criteria are simple: 1 Your startup is based in NRW 2 Your startup was founded within the past 3 years 3 Your startup focuses on digital processes, services, or business models Apply now and reach your next milestone: https://lnkd.in/gUF9FeB Follow the OUT OF THE BOX.NRW LinkedIn Account to stay tuned for even more exciting news! Founders Foundation gGmbH | Dominik Gross | Gabriela Pantring | Mona Neubaur #hinterlandofthings #ootbnrw #bielefeld #startuppitch #entrepreneurship #startup #pitchevent

ğŸğŸ ğ¬ğ­ğšğ«ğ­ğ®ğ©ğ¬ ğŸğ«ğ¨ğ¦ ğ…ğ«ğšğ§ğ¤ğŸğ®ğ«ğ­ ğšğ¦ ğŒğšğ¢ğ§ ğ­ğ¨ ğ°ğšğ­ğœğ¡ Frankfurt am Main is not only a financial hotspot in Europe, boasting numerous banks and esteemed financial institutions, it also has a vibrant and multifaceted startup ecosystem worth keeping an eye on. According to the Next Generation Startups in Germany 2022 Report by Startup-Verband, with 10.1 new startups per 100,000 inhabitants in 2022, it is in third place behind the startup strongholds Munich and Berlin and improved by four places compared to the previous year. (https://lnkd.in/esvXp3X9) This is not by chance. Entrepreneurial ambition has always flowed through the Main metropolis, making it an ideal breeding ground for innovative startups. Frankfurt's startup scene thrives on the city's specialised business sectors, well established companies and a strong local investment appetite. Here are 10 Frankfurt startups making a difference: Emma â€“ The Sleep Company PraxisEins. QuoIntelligence Finanzguru Preventio ENVIRIA bettervest GmbH ROOMHERO Traxpay CLARK #10Startups #Innovation #Startup

The State of Bavaria Office for South America, together with the IHK Schwaben would like to invite you to the Bavarian & Latin American Startup Meetup in Augsburg, that we are organizing on Wednesday, September 27, 2023. Together with Bavarian and Latin American Startups we will discuss question like what the strengths and weaknesses of both innovation and startup ecosystems are and how to collaborate on a regional, national, and international level with partners of other ecosystems. You can register here https://lnkd.in/eduq739T #startups #innovation #germany

ğŸš€ Exciting Partnership Announcement! ğŸš€ Thrilled to share: ScalingLab and Startuplab have joined forces and entered into a new partnership! ğŸŒ ğŸš€ StartupLab, Norway's leading player in early-phase startups, have aligned their strengths to support the burgeoning success of companies emerging from the StartupLab ecosystem. ğŸ¤ Scaling Lab, known for its longstanding track record and partnership with MiT in to developing competence and support to foster exponential growth of Norwegian companies. Scaling Lab has set its sights on the future, with the ambition to launch an Oslo Region Scaling Program in 2024. Excitingly, partners in the Oslo region, including Startuplab and Institute for Energy Technology (IFE Invest), have already rallied to join this innovative initiative. ğŸ”— Together, we envision a ecosystem where we in addition to having a robust system for early phase, we will work together to also support the growth and expansion of our tech companies. Our combined strengths will pave the way for unprecedented opportunities, empowering entrepreneurs to reach new heights. ğŸš€ Join us on this journey! Come and meet us at Forskningsparken - Oslo Science Park Startuplab, Per Einar Dybvik, Gisle Ã˜stereng, Per Ingvar Olsen, Harald Hvidsten, Egil Bergsager, Svein Olse SÃ¦ther, #ScalingLab #StartupLab #Partnership #Innovation #StartupEcosystem #Entrepreneurship #ExponentialGrowth #Collaboration #TechNews #StartupSuccess #OsloRegionScalingProgram #FutureOfInnovation

ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ªğŸ’¥ Report alert ğŸ’¥ ğŸ‡¸ğŸ‡ª When 'The state of Swedish tech 2023' is launched, we learn that Swedish startups have doubled in value the last five years. "Impact is one of Sweden's startups' absolute strongest areas, and this is confirmed in the figures seen in this report. I now hope that many more investors and customers will open their eyes to these rapidly growing companies. Here are many answers to our global challenges and now is the time to rally together for scaling up!â€ says Stina Lantz, CEO, SISP - Swedish Incubators & Science Parks ğŸ“‘ Read the full report: https://lnkd.in/dTMRz2gW ğŸ¤ The state of Swedish tech 2023 is made by Dealroom.co in partnership with Business Sweden, Svenska institutet (Swedish Institute), Tillvaxtverket (Swedish Agency for Economic and Regional Development), Vinnova and SISP - Swedish Incubators & Science Parks. #Sweden #SwedishStartups #Innovation #ImpactInvestment #SwedenTechEcosystem
